echo.message: ECTester is built using three ant files:
- build-applet.xml - For building the JavaCard applet.
-> build: Build the applet.
-> build-221: Build the applet for JavaCard 2.2.1.
-> build-222: Build the applet for JavaCard 2.2.2.
-> upload: Upload the applet using the GPPro tool.
(use `-Dcap=ectester221.cap` to upload the 2.2.1 version.)
-> upload-emv: Upload the applet using the GPPro tool and the EMV key protocol.
(use `-Dcap=ectester221.cap` to upload the 2.2.1 version.)
- build-reader.xml - For building the reader app.
-> jar: Build the reader app.
-> package: Build the reader app into a distributable single jar, along with dependencies.
- build-standalone.xml - For building the standalone app.
-> jar: Build the standalone app.
-> headers: Build the JNI header for testing native libraries.
-> libs: Build the JNI shims for testing native libraries.
-> libs-try: Build the JNI shims for testing native libraries, but do not fail if some are not available.
-> package: Build the standalone app into a distributable single jar, along with dependencies.
Finally, this file provides four targets:
-> build:
-> package:
-> clean:
-> help:
